body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us. My name is Juan Price and I'm with Quantum Hotels. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Andrea. Can I ask for your date of birth in a day, month, year format?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's zero six two two one nine seven five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Now, could you provide me with your home address including street number, street name, city, and postal code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's one two three Main Street, Anytown, AB, one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information. Is there anything specific you need assistance with regarding your stay at our hotel?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm concerned about privacy during my stay, and it's making me feel sad.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Andrea. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will do our best to ensure your privacy and comfort during your stay. If you have any further questions or requests, feel free to let me know. Thank you for your time today.
